;(Contact Companions in Combat - Kachina, optional)<!--some of their dialogues will auto-play during the quest later, but can be played earlier-->
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 xilonen 02.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Great work. Don't worry, we're unstoppable.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 kachina 03.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' We...? Aww, is that also a compliment towards me? ...Hehe, yeah, we ARE unstoppable!

;(Contact Companions in Combat - Chasca, optional)
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 chasca 01.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' *guttural growling*
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 kidane 01.ogg}} '''Kidane:''' Chasca's unleashed her suppressed beast... Whew, she's even scarier than the monsters we're fighting...

;(Contact Companions in Combat - Ororon, optional)
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 olorun 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Okay, everyone's safe. Granny, please go on ahead with the others. I just need some more time &mdash; I promise I won't hold things up.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 citlali 01.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' Ororon...
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 citlali 02.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' Leave the vegetables and aphids behind, you dimwit! It's too dangerous!

;(Contact Fighting Fatui, optional)
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 thecaptain 01.ogg}} '''"The Captain":''' Area secure. What's your status?
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 guselnikov 01.ogg}} '''Guselnikov:''' Commander, we're facing a huge wave of monsters! Requesting urgent backup!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 thecaptain 02.ogg}} '''"The Captain":''' Acknowledged. I'm 200 meters out. I'll fight my way to you.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 thecaptain 03.ogg}} '''"The Captain":''' Hya!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 guselnikov 02.ogg}} '''Guselnikov:''' Commander, all enemies neutralized. Falling in!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 thecaptain 04.ogg}} '''"The Captain":''' Mm.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Whoa, looks like they can hold their own just fine.

;(Contact Companions in Combat - Mualani, optional)
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 mualani 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Did you guys see that huge fireball!? It exploded right above my head!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Sorry, Mualani. I'll adjust my aim.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 mualani 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' No no, you're good, Archon! It didn't hurt at all, plus it was friggin' cool!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Not great for your eyesight, though.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 mualani 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Oh yeah... Fair point.

;(Contact Companions in Combat - Mavuika, optional)<ref group=Note Name=Haborym></ref>
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' What is it? Something to report?
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Heh, no, Paimon just... suddenly wanted to hear your voice.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' ...Alright then.
----
;(Approach the enemies)
:{{A|vo ntaq108 1 kinich 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' The Abyss has amassed a large army, but we have the manpower to take them on. Plus, we can use the power of the Night Kingdom to communicate directly and mobilize our forces on the fly.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 1 kinich 02.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' There's no rush. Slow and steady does it.

;(Approach the Abyssal Pylons)
:{{A|vo ntaq108 2 chimalli 01.ogg}} '''Chimalli:''' For Natlan!!!

;(After destroying one Abyssal Pylon)
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Whoa, what the...? Aerial support from Mavuika!?
:{{A|vo ntaq108 4 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Look how powerful she is now! It's borderline unfair...

;(After destroying all Abyssal Pylons)
:{{A|vo ntaq108 3 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Use my power to destroy the Abyss Tumors.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 3 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Got it! Thanks for the backup!

;(After destroying the Abyss Tumor)
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 xilonen 01.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' The Children of Echoes' territory is secure. All monsters down.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 kachina 01.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' I'll go deal with the Abyss Tumor!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 mualani 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' All good here at the People of the Springs, too. We crushed it!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 citlali 01.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' Masters of the Night-Wind are also safe. Should I go support the Flower-Feather Clan?
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 olorun 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Things are still pretty rough over there. I'm already en route.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 chasca 01.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' No need. I just dealt with it.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Already!? But you were just at the Stadium!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 chasca 02.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Yeah, well. You have no idea how long I've been itching to bash some heads in.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh... Fair enough...
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 mualani 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Iansan, what should we do about the Collective of Plenty? Your home's a long ways away from the stadium.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 iansan 01.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Oh, no need to worry. I just heard from [[Varesa]], she says they're safe now.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 kinich 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Sounds like all regions are secured. The Abyss forces are weakening.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah! Their only game-plan was to outnumber us, and that ain't gonna work now that we have the Ode of Resurrection on our side!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 kinich 02.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Hold up... The Abyss is sending a sizeable unit towards the stadium.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 kinich 03.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' I guess they've realized that the Ode of Resurrection is a game changer, so now, they are going to try to destroy the sacred flame.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 mualani 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' We ain't gonna let them get away with that. Friends, let's gather at the stadium!
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 xilonen 02.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' More Abyss Tumors have descended, all near the Stadium. Let's split up and take them out.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 xilonen 03.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Oh, and we need someone to guard the main entrance.
:{{DIcon}} Allow me.
:{{A|vo ntaq108 5 mualani 04.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Alright. This is the final battle!
